alert.note: Alert for Tate; Tunica (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 22 at 9:06PM CDT until March 23 at 4:00PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Memphis TN has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Mississippi... Coldwater River near Sarah For the Coldwater River...including Sarah, Marks...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING TO TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Coldwater River near Sarah. * WHEN...From this evening to tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 18.0 feet, Low-lying farmland near the river begins to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 PM CDT Tuesday the stage was 18.1 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 8:00 PM CDT Tuesday was 18.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 19.0 feet around midnight tonight. It will then fall below flood stage late tomorrow afternoon. - Flood stage is 18.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at weather.gov/memphis. The next statement will be issued as conditions warrant.
